product_overview: KingTire is a web platform that enables users to search and compare tire inventories with enhanced features such as membership management, shopping cart comparisons, and consultation modes for stores.
core_goals: Provide accurate and real-time tire inventory data via proxy integration with blackcircles.co.kr.
Enable comprehensive tire search filters including size, brand, product, inventory availability, and DOT codes.
Facilitate user membership registration with tiered membership levels for personalized experiences.
Allow users to compare selected tires via a shopping cart-like comparison feature.
Offer a quote generation function to support purchase decisions.
Support store mode for live consultations displaying available tires to regular customers.
Implement communication via KakaoTalk messaging tailored by membership levels.
key_features: Membership registration with tiered member management.
Advanced tire search filtered by size, brand, product, inventory status, and DOT codes.
Shopping cart comparison for evaluating multiple tire options.
Quote function to request price estimates or information.
Store mode enabling consultations with customers while displaying tire selections.
KakaoTalk messaging integration to send messages based on membership level.
Proxy API integration for fetching tire inventory and product search data from blackcircles.co.kr.
user_flow_summary: User registers and logs in with membership credentials reflecting membership level.
User searches tires using multiple filters such as size, brand, product, inventory, and DOT.
User adds selected tires to a comparison cart to evaluate options side-by-side.
User uses the quote feature to request a price or purchase estimate for selected tires.
Store personnel activate store mode to provide live consultation to customers while showcasing tire inventory.
System sends targeted KakaoTalk messages to users according to their membership tier for marketing or support.
validation_criteria: Successful registration and login of users with appropriate membership levels.
Accurate search results from the proxy APIs according to the applied filters.
Functional shopping cart comparison allowing multiple tire selections and side-by-side comparison.
Correct operation of the quote feature generating valid and actionable price quotes.
Store mode enables consultation functionality and displays tires correctly to customers.
KakaoTalk message sending works by membership level accurately and reliably.
API proxy endpoints (/api/inventory and /api/shop) respond with success and valid data.
